articles.title: Aston Martin reveals new F1 safety and medical cars for 2021 - Motorsport.com, Edition: Australia
articles.description: Aston Martin’s new Formula 1 safety car and medical chase vehicle will make their debuts at this week’s pre-season test in Bahrain before being used in the opening grand prix of the season there on March 28.
articles.content: As previously reported by Motorsport.com, Aston Martin which returns as a manufacturer F1 entrant for the first time in over 60 years will share the safety and medical car duties with long-time suppl… [+5423 chars]
